reviews.customers_say: Customers find the outfit cute and appreciate its versatility, with one mentioning it can be separated to create multiple outfits.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful outfit
items.body: Ordered for my maternity shoot (size M) and the pictures came out great!!!! The fit was great the material as well. It was not see through in any way. The colour is a soft beige/ cream and enhances the details beautifully. The skirt is very stretchy and bump friendly. It has a fake string so you cant adjust the waist. But this wasnt a big deal for me. I was happy with my purchase. I think the 42usd I paid was worth it as I can wear the top with other pieces in my wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Shiraz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: Stunning, wore it for babymoon - very comfortable & stretchy material. Can’t wait to wear it again without the bump Read more
items.author: Bimla S

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super soft and Comfy!
items.body: I originally bought this because I thought it was navy blue but it is black. It is super comfy but light! For refernce I am 5'3 and this hit me right below my ankles, with heels or a chunky sandal it would fall perfectly. The little trimming is only on the top of the shirt and top the the pants. The shirt is a little big and honestly could have sized down I am a size 6/8 and a Medium in shirts and I ordered a medium. Totally worth it! Read more
items.author: BakedAlaska

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute!
items.body: SO CUTE!! I’m 5’4 120lbs I got a small. Tiny bit long other than that it’s perfect. Read more
items.author: Jamie

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars A perfect bachelorette set!
items.body: AMAZING! Got this for my bachelorette trip and soooo glad I did. I got a size Large, color apricot and it wasn’t sheer at all, the quality of the skirt was fantastic, and it fit perfect and was so comfy! I am 5’5 and the length was perfect as well with it being pulled up to my waist. With all that said I am only giving it a 3/5 stars because it is definitely a cheaper piece of clothing. The back was adjustable and that was nice but the straps on the back were super thin and not the most flattering. The bottom was also an awkward length so I ended up just tucking it under itself. The ties on the skirt didn’t actually do anything and were not very cute. But these are all minor details and would not stop me from recommending it to people! Read more
items.author: Dylan Knepper

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor quality
items.body: Why is the skirt so wide at the top? It didn’t fit me—the waist was much too big. I’m really disappointed. Read more
items.author: Laura Fonseca

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not made for large chest
items.body: See through! Tried to wear for a pregnancy announcement, would not recommend if you have a large chest Read more
items.author: Lisa Reed

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 2 pc outfit
items.body: Great outfit. Daughter wore it in her senior pictures and it was very versatile. Plenty of stretch and ability to tighten or loosen in sizing. Vibrant red color Read more
items.author: Caitlin Fincher

short_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: U-red Backless Outfits, U-black Backless Outfits, U-orange Backless Outfits, U-apricot Backless Outfits, U-pink Backless Outfits, U-white Backless Outfits, U-yellow Backless Outfits. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
